body.text:
Welcome to your HR Self Service Assistant.
Here are the options I can assist you with today

items.text: How do I submit an expense report?
Get details on the process for claiming work-related expenses.
Find out the date of your next salary payment.

selectAction.data: What are the steps to relocate to another Contoso office?

items.text: How can I relocate to another office?
Get information on the process and support available for relocating to a different office.
